comment.author: Angila
comment.text: If Blacks actually did their investigation on hillary they woukd think twice b4 voting the liar! Margaret Sanger and Robert Bryd, 2 of her mentore!

replies.author: Devin
replies.text: Diamond and Silk are really getting it out there for Trump! Doing an amazing job!

replies.author: Elizabeth
replies.text: She's way up in the polls in spite of Comey's dirty politics. It's over for him politically. Persuaded to go against centuries old election rules by the GOP and unfortunately all it did was cost him his career and the public's respect. He'll be gone by the end of the year. Only qualified candidate is Clinton. She will win. Not worried at all about Don the Con. Btw...The Biggest Loser needs some new cast members so he should be good in a couple of weeks to pursue a new reality TV show venture. He'll have lots of time on his tiny little hands. ðŸ˜‚
